main event: A sighting of a single circular object occurred on 6 February 1956 in San Fernando, California.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a pinhead at arm's length., The color of the object was yellowish-white like a light bulb., The object was moving at an estimated speed of 500 knots., The sighting lasted for about 10 seconds., The Air Force concluded it was likely an aircraft sighting.
